net.threescale.api.v2
Interface Api2

All Known Implementing Classes:
Api2Impl
public interface Api2

Version 2 of the 3Scale API. This version is not compatible with Version 1. See http://www.3scale.net/support/api-service-management-v2-0/ for more details

Method Summary

          Fetch the current statistics for an application.

Method Detail

authorize

AuthorizeResponse authorize(java.lang.String app_key,
                            java.lang.String referrer)
                            throws ApiException
Fetch the current statistics for an application.

Parameters:
app_key - Optional Application Key (or null)
referrer - Optional referrer ip address (or null)'
Returns:
AuthorizeResponse containing the current usage metrics.
Throws:
ApiException - if there is an error connection to the server

report

            throws ApiException
Send a set of usage data to the server

Parameters:
transactions - Usage data to be recorded
Throws:
ApiException - if there is an error connection to the server
